sentences.en: He drove the police car at full throttle and dashed at the gangsters.
sentences.cn: 他驾驶着警车开足马力向匪徒冲去.

sentences.en: He gently opened the throttle, and the ship began to ease forward.
sentences.cn: 他轻轻松开油门杆，轮船开始缓缓前行。

sentences.en: He stepped swiftly to the controls to throttle back the engine.
sentences.cn: 他快步来到控制台跟前，减小了油门。

sentences.en: He twisted the throttle control to max power.
sentences.cn: 他把节气门的开关拧到最大。

sentences.en: He wanted to seize the baby and throttle it.
sentences.cn: 他真想把孩子抓过来卡死.

sentences.en: He's determined to live his whole life at full throttle.
sentences.cn: 他决心开足马力过好一生.

sentences.en: High tariffs throttle trade between countries.
sentences.cn: 高的关税抑制了国与国之间的贸易.

sentences.en: High tariffs throttle trade between nations.
sentences.cn: 高的关税抑制着国与国之间的贸易.

sentences.en: policies which are throttling many Asian economies
sentences.cn: 抑制许多亚洲国家经济发展的政策

sentences.en: Remember to throttle down before you go round a sharp corner.
sentences.cn: 务必记住,急转弯前要减速.

sentences.en: The adjusting of screw prevents the throttle valve from moving to the fully closed position.
sentences.cn: 调节螺钉防止节气门运动到全关闭位置.

sentences.en: The attacker then tried to throttle her with wire.
sentences.cn: 然后袭击者企图用电线勒死她。

sentences.en: The ignition - distributor vacuum - advance mechanism advances the spark during part - throttle operation.
sentences.cn: 分电器点火真空提前装置在节气门部分开启期间,使火花提前发出.

sentences.en: The team’s offense ran full throttle.
They know how to control, restrict and, if need be, throttle access, important to newspapers and absolutely vital to radio and television. And if you don't play the game, you're toast.
sentences.cn: 他们知道怎样控制、限制信息获取途径，而且如果需要，还会将其完全阻断，而这些途径对报纸来说很重要，对广播、电视更是极其关键。如果你不遵守游戏规则，你就完蛋了。

sentences.en: We were going at full throttle.
You have to push the throttle forward for more power.
sentences.cn: 你得把油门杆往前推来加大马力。

words.tran_cn: 压制，扼杀；使……窒息；使……节流

phrases.tran_cn: adv. 以最高速度；油门大开地
手油门；手节气门；手风门
节流操纵；节流控制；推力调节

trans.tran_cn: （汽车、飞机的）节流阀，油门杆，油门踏板，功率，马力，风门（杆）
trans.tran_en: a piece of equipment that controls the amount of  fuel  going into a vehicle’s engine

trans.tran_cn: 扼杀，压制，勒死，使窒息，使节流，（用节汽阀等）调节
trans.tran_en: to make it difficult or impossible for something to succeed
